com.jfcbuilder.builders

Class OhlcPlotBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jfcbuilder.builders.OhlcPlotBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VolumeXYPlotBuilder

    public class OhlcPlotBuilder
extends Object
implements IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
    Builder for producing stock market Open High Low Close (OHLC) plots using configured builder properties, series, and datasets.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OhlcPlotBuilder annotation(IXYAnnotationBuilder<?> annotation)
      Registers an IXYAnnotationBuilder whose build() method will be called to generate its XYAnnotation when this plot builder's build() method is called.
      OhlcPlotBuilder axisColor(Paint color)
      Sets the axis color to use when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder axisFontColor(Paint color)
      Sets the axis font color to use when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder backgroundColor(Paint color)
      Sets the plot background color to use when building the plot.
      org.jfree.chart.plot.XYPlot build()
      Builds the DOHLC plot.
      static OhlcPlotBuilder get()
      Factory method for obtaining new instances of this class.
      OhlcPlotBuilder gridLines()
      Deprecated. 
      This facility is replaced by majorGrid(boolean) and minorGrid(boolean), and will be removed in a future release.

      For removal since v1.5.7
      OhlcPlotBuilder indexRange(ZeroBasedIndexRange indexRange)
      Sets the zero-based index range used to index into all source data for building the XYPlot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder majorGrid(boolean enabled)
      Toggles displaying major grid lines ON or OFF.
      OhlcPlotBuilder majorGridColor(Paint color)
      Sets the major grid color to use when building the plot.

      Sets the major grid line style to use when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder marker(MarkerBuilder line)
      Registers a MarkerBuilder whose build() method will be called to generate its plot line when this plot builder'sbuild() method is called.
      OhlcPlotBuilder minorGrid(boolean enabled)
      Toggles displaying minor grid lines ON or OFF.
      OhlcPlotBuilder minorGridColor(Paint color)
      Sets the minor grid color to use when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder minorGridStyle(Stroke style)
      Sets the minor grid line style to use when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder noGridLines()
      Sets displaying all grid lines OFF.
      int plotWeight()
      Gets the currently configured plot weight.
      OhlcPlotBuilder plotWeight(int weight)
      Sets the plot weight to be attributed to the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder series(IXYTimeSeriesBuilder<?> series)
      Registers an IXYTimeSeriesBuilder whose build() method will be called to generate its XYTimeSeries when this plot builder's build() method is called.
      OhlcPlotBuilder series(IXYTimeSeriesDatasetBuilder<?> dataset)
      Same as interface IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder<?>.series(IXYTimeSeriesDatasetBuilder<?>) but also checks that only one OhlcSeriesBuilder is ever added because only one is allowed per plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder showTimeGaps(boolean showTimeGaps)
      Toggle whether to show time gaps at x-values where there is no corresponding time instance.
      OhlcPlotBuilder timeData(long[] timeData)
      Sets the date-time values to be used when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder xAxis(org.jfree.chart.axis.ValueAxis xAxis)
      Sets the x-axis used when building the plot.
      OhlcPlotBuilder yAxisName(String name)
      Sets the plot's y-axis name.
      OhlcPlotBuilder yAxisRange(double lower, double upper)
      Sets an explicit y-axis value range to use instead of having the y-axis auto-calculate it.
      OhlcPlotBuilder yAxisTickSize(double size)
      Sets the plot's y-axis tick size.
      OhlcPlotBuilder yTickFormat(NumberFormat format)
      Sets the plot's y-axis tick format.

      • indexRange

        public OhlcPlotBuilder indexRange(ZeroBasedIndexRange indexRange)
        Description copied from interface: IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder
        Sets the zero-based index range used to index into all source data for building the XYPlot. This is an optimization to allow clients to supply existing data without having to copy and/or crop it to match the desired size axis range in the chart.
        Specified by:
        indexRange in interface IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
        Parameters:
        indexRange - The index range to be set
        Returns:
        Reference to this builder instance for method chaining

      • series

        public OhlcPlotBuilder series(IXYTimeSeriesDatasetBuilder<?> dataset)
        Same as interface IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder<?>.series(IXYTimeSeriesDatasetBuilder<?>) but also checks that only one OhlcSeriesBuilder is ever added because only one is allowed per plot.
        Specified by:
        series in interface IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
        Parameters:
        dataset - The series builder representing the series that it will build
        Returns:
        Reference to this builder instance for method chaining
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If an OhlcSeriesBuilder was already added.

        @Deprecated
public OhlcPlotBuilder gridLines()
        Deprecated. This facility is replaced by majorGrid(boolean) and minorGrid(boolean), and will be removed in a future release.

        For removal since v1.5.7

        Sets displaying grid lines ON.

      • noGridLines

        public OhlcPlotBuilder noGridLines()
        Description copied from interface: IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder
        Sets displaying all grid lines OFF. Shorthand for calling both IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder.majorGrid(boolean) and IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder.minorGrid(boolean) with a value of false.
        Specified by:
        noGridLines in interface IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>

        Reference to this builder instance for method chaining

      • build

        public org.jfree.chart.plot.XYPlot build()
                                  throws IllegalStateException
        Builds the DOHLC plot. The DOHLC series is shown behind all other series that were added.
        Specified by:
        build in interface IXYTimeSeriesPlotBuilder<OhlcPlotBuilder>
        Returns:
        New instance of an plot corresponding to all configured data sets and settings
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If an OhlcSeriesBuilder was not set, if time axis was not set, or if time data was not set.
